Thanks

Author: Beliveinbit
Title: [ANN] Block Broker Decentralized ICO Broker!!
Body: Hi guys!  I found your project very interesting and I wish you a great success!  1. Please can you tell me how you are going to evaluate pooled tokens? What are the most important aspects you are keeping in mind while evaluating potential of ICO. 2. In white paper you indicated: As soon as the chosen ICO is complete and the tokens are listed on exchanges the BBK tokens are returned and the tokens of the investorâ€™s chosen ICO are sent to them. Are you sure that all pooled tokens will be listed?

Author: blockbroker
Title: [ANN] Block Broker Decentralized ICO Broker!!
Body: Thank you for your question.  Yes we are. We evaluate each token before accepting in our network. We also provide them support to ensure their token gets listed. This is what makes the BBK platform so great because as an investor you know without certain that either way you are going to get money from your investment. The worse case scenario is that the pooled token wont get listed on exchanges (this will never happen) at which case you have a full stack of BBK tokens to the value or higher value of the pooled tokens investment so for the investor it is win/win and for the owner of the ICO or pooled tokens it is beneficial for them also.  Thanks
